name: setReferences
desc: Sets references to dependent components.

name: CommandableHttpClient
desc: Abstract client that calls commandable HTTP service.

name: CommandableHttpClient
desc: Creates a new instance of the client.

name: callCommand
desc:
Calls a remote method via HTTP commadable protocol.
The call is made via POST operation and all parameters are sent in body object.
The complete route to remote method is defined as baseRoute + "/" + name.

name: CommandableHttpController
desc:
Abstract controller that receives remove calls via HTTP/REST protocol
to operations automatically generated for commands defined in ICommandable components.
Each command is exposed as POST operation that receives all parameters in body object.

name: CommandableHttpController
desc: Creates a new instance of the controller.

name: configure
desc: Configures component by passing configuration parameters.

name: register
desc: Registers all controller routes in HTTP endpoint.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: DefaultHttpFactory
desc: Creates HTTP components by their descriptors.

name: DefaultHttpFactory
desc: Create a new instance of the factory.

name: HeartbeatRestController
desc: Controller returns heartbeat via HTTP/REST protocol.

name: HeartbeatRestController
desc: Creates a new instance of this controller.

name: configure
desc: Configures component by passing configuration parameters.

name: register
desc: Registers all controller routes in HTTP endpoint.

name: HttpEndpoint
desc: Used for creating HTTP endpoints. An endpoint is a URL, at which a given service can be accessed by a client.

name: close
desc: Closes this endpoint and the REST server (service) that was opened earlier.

name: configure
desc: Configures this HttpEndpoint using the given configuration parameters.

name: getServer
desc:
Gets an HTTP server instance.
Returns an HTTP server instance of null if endpoint is closed.

name: getTraceId
desc: Returns traceId from request

name: isOpen
desc: Returns whether or not this endpoint is open with an actively listening REST server.

name: open
desc:
Opens a connection using the parameters resolved by the referenced connection
resolver and creates a REST server (service) using the set options and parameters.

name: register
desc: Registers a registerable object for dynamic endpoint discovery.

name: registerInterceptor
desc: Registers a middleware action for the given route.

name: registerRoute
desc: Registers an action in this objects REST server (service) by the given method and route.

name: registerRouteWithAuth
desc:
Registers an action with authorization in this objects REST server (service)
by the given method and route.

name: setReferences
desc: Sets references to this endpoint's logger, counters, and connection resolver.

name: unregister
desc:
Unregisters a registerable object, so that it is no longer used in dynamic
endpoint discovery.

name: HttpRequestDetector
desc: Helper class that retrieves parameters from HTTP requests.

name: detectAddress
desc: Detects the IP address from which the given HTTP request was received.

name: detectBrowser
desc: Detects the browser (using "user-agent") from which the given HTTP request was made.

name: detectPlatform
desc: Detects the platform (using "user-agent") from which the given HTTP request was made.

name: detectServerHost
desc: Detects the host name of the request's destination server.

name: detectServerPort
desc: Detects the request's destination port number.

name: HttpResponseSender
desc: Helper class that handles HTTP-based responses.

name: sendCreatedResult
desc:
Creates a function that sends newly created object as JSON.
That callack function call be called directly or passed
as a parameter to business logic components.

name: sendDeletedResult
desc:
Creates a function that sends deleted object as JSON.
That callack function call be called directly or passed
as a parameter to business logic components.

name: sendEmptyResult
desc:
Creates a function that sends an empty result with 204 status code.
If error occur it sends ErrorDescription with approproate status code.

name: sendError
desc:
Sends error serialized as ErrorDescription object
and appropriate HTTP status code.
If status code is not defined, it uses 500 status code.

name: sendResult
desc:
Creates a function that sends result as JSON object.
That function call be called directly or passed
as a parameter to business logic components.

name: RestClient
desc: Abstract client that calls remove endpoints using HTTP/REST protocol.

name: addFilterParams
desc:
Adds filter parameters (with the same name as they defined)
to invocation parameter map.

name: addPagingParams
desc: Adds paging parameters (skip, take, total) to invocation parameter map.

name: addTraceId
desc: Adds a trace id (trace_id) to invocation parameter map.

name: baseRoute
desc: The base route.

name: call
desc: Calls a remote method via HTTP/REST protocol.

name: client
desc: The HTTP client.

name: close
desc: Closes component and frees used resources.

name: configure
desc: Configures component by passing configuration parameters.

name: connectTimeout
desc: The connection timeout in milliseconds.

name: connectionResolver
desc: The connection resolver.

name: counters
desc: The performance counters.

name: headers
desc: The default headers to be added to every request.

name: instrument
desc:
Adds instrumentation to log calls and measure call time.
It returns a Timing object that is used to end the time measurement.

name: instrumentError
desc: Adds instrumentation to error handling.

name: isOpen
desc:
Checks if the component is opened.
Returns true if the component has been opened and false otherwise.

name: logger
desc: The logger.

name: open
desc: Opens the component.

name: options
desc: The configuration options.

name: retries
desc: The number of retries.

name: setReferences
desc: Sets references to dependent components.

name: timeout
desc: The invocation timeout in milliseconds.

name: tracer
desc: The tracer.

name: uri
desc: The remote service uri which is calculated on open.

name: RestController
desc: Abstract controller that receives remove calls via HTTP/REST protocol.

name: baseRoute
desc: The base route.

name: close
desc: Closes component and frees used resources.

name: configure
desc: Configures component by passing configuration parameters.

name: counters
desc: The performance counters.

name: dependencyResolver
desc: The dependency resolver.

name: endpoint
desc: The HTTP endpoint that exposes this controller.

name: getTraceId
desc: Returns traceId from request

name: instrument
desc:
Adds instrumentation to log calls and measure call time.
It returns a Timing object that is used to end the time measurement.

name: instrumentError
desc: Adds instrumentation to error handling.

name: isOpen
desc: Checks if the component is opened.

name: logger
desc: The logger.

name: open
desc: Opens the component.

name: register
desc: Registers all controller routes in HTTP endpoint.

name: registerInterceptor
desc: Registers a middleware for a given route in HTTP endpoint.

name: registerRoute
desc: Registers a route in HTTP endpoint.

name: registerRouteWithAuth
desc: Registers a route with authorization in HTTP endpoint.

name: sendCreatedResult
desc:
Creates function that sends newly created object as JSON.
That function call be called directly or passed
as a parameter to business logic components.

name: sendDeletedResult
desc:
Creates a function that sends deleted object as JSON.
That function call be called directly or passed
as a parameter to business logic components.

name: sendError
desc:
Sends error serialized as ErrorDescription object
and appropriate HTTP status code.
If status code is not defined, it uses 500 status code.

name: sendResult
desc:
Sends result as JSON object.
That function call be called directly or passed
as a parameter to business logic components.

name: setReferences
desc: Sets references to dependent components.

name: unsetReferences
desc: Unsets (clears) previously set references to dependent components.

name: configure
desc: Configures component by passing configuration parameters.

name: getTraceId
desc: Returns trace id from request

name: setReferences
desc: Sets references to dependent components.

name: setReferences
desc: Sets references to dependent components.

name: status
desc: Handles status requests

name: StatusRestController
desc: Controller that returns microservice status information via HTTP/REST protocol.

name: StatusRestController
desc: Creates a new instance of this controller.

name: configure
desc: Configures component by passing configuration parameters.

name: register
desc: Registers all controller routes in HTTP endpoint.

name: setReferences
desc: Sets references to dependent components.

desc:
Calls a remote method via HTTP commadable protocol.
The call is made via POST operation and all parameters are sent in body object.

name: TestRestClient
desc: REST client used for automated testing.

desc: Calls a remote method via HTTP/REST protocol.
